bug.author: ChristianFJung
bug.summary: Why Does streamlit flip and change my graph?
bug.description:
This is what the graph should look like. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4527481/74758889-f5e70300-5245-11ea-8e3e-d0d98ad07f74.png></denchmark-link>
This is what it looks like in streamlit. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4527481/74758969-144cfe80-5246-11ea-94c0-5f60b434fd2b.png></denchmark-link>
Notice how the graph is upside down and yaxis is not showing.

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ChristianFJung>@ChristianFJung</denchmark-link> , Could you provide sample code so we can repro your issue?
